query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Interim Communication Strategy and Plan
result.description: This deliverable will include the interim communication plan and strategy and all communication activities performed by COREALIS partners. It will summarise all activities until M18 and those still planned. It reports the results of T7.1 until M18.

result.title: Just-In-Time Rail Shuttle Service feasibility study

result.title: Discussion paper on long-run spillover and coordination effects of fiscal policy reforms

result.title: Working paper on cross-country pension reform coordination
result.description: This paper uses a multi-country country overlapping generations model with intertemporal trade, imperfect labour markets and pay-as-you-go pension systems to study the spillover effects from population aging and pension reforms and the related need for policy coordination.
